com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.api

Interface IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder
    Enclosing interface:
    IScriptCreationApi

    @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public static interface IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder
extends IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder
    The IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder provides the methods callable during creation of an IScriptTask with IScriptTaskType is bound to a project.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • code

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder code(@DelegatesTo(value=IProjectScriptExecutionContext.class,strategy=1)
                                                                    groovy.lang.Closure<?> taskCode)
        Sets the taskCode Closure, which is called when the IScriptTask is executed.

        The task code gets a delegate set before the execution call of type IProjectScriptExecutionContext.

        The passed arguments to the closure are defined by the IScriptTaskType of the IScriptTask. So the arguments can differ for eacj IScriptTaskType.

        This method call is required, because every IScriptTask needs a code block.

        Parameters:
        taskCode - the task code
        Returns:
        this builder
        See Also:
        IApplicationScriptExecutionContext

      • code

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder code(IScriptTaskCode<IProjectScriptExecutionContext> taskCode)
        Sets the IScriptTaskCode, which is called when the IScriptTask is executed.

        See code(Closure) for usage details.

        This method is mainly for Java clients.

        This method call is required, because every IScriptTask needs a code block.

        Parameters:
        taskCode - the task code
        Returns:
        this builder
        See Also:
        IProjectScriptExecutionContext

      • isExecutableIf

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder isExecutableIf(@DelegatesTo(value=IScriptCreationApi.IScriptExecutionContextWithNotExecutableReasons.class,strategy=1)
                                                                              groovy.lang.Closure<?> isExecutable)
        Sets the isExecutable Closure, which is called before the IScriptTask is executed.
        You can set an isExecutableIf handler, which is called before the IScriptTask is executed. The code can evaluate, if the IScriptTask shall be executable. If the handler returns true, the code of the IScriptTask is executable, otherwise false. See class INotExecutableReasonBuilder.IExecutableTaskEvaluator for details.

        The Closure isExecutable has to return a boolean. The passed arguments to the closure are the same as the code{ } block arguments.

        Inside of the Closure a property notExecutableReasons is available to set reasons why it is not executable. It is highly recommended to set reasons, when the Closure returns false.

        Specified by:
        isExecutableIf in interface IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder
        Parameters:
        isExecutable - the code which is executed to evaluate the execution state.
        Returns:
        this builder
        See Also:
        INotExecutableReasonBuilder.IExecutableTaskEvaluator

      • isExecutableIf

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder isExecutableIf(INotExecutableReasonBuilder.IExecutableTaskEvaluator isExecutable)
        Sets the INotExecutableReasonBuilder.IExecutableTaskEvaluator, which is called before the IScriptTask is executed.

        See IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder.isExecutableIf(Closure) for usage details.

        This method is mainly for Java clients.

        Specified by:
        isExecutableIf in interface IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder
        Parameters:
        isExecutable - the INotExecutableReasonBuilder.IExecutableTaskEvaluator instance
        Returns:
        this builder
        See Also:
        INotExecutableReasonBuilder.IExecutableTaskEvaluator

      • taskDescription

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder taskDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Sets the task description of the script task.
        Task Description
        A script task can have an optional description text. The description shall help the user of the script task to understand what the task does. The method IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder.taskDescription(String) sets the description of the script task.

        The description shall be a short overview. The String can be multiline.

        Specified by:
        taskDescription in interface IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder
        Parameters:
        description - the description text for the script task
        Returns:
        this builder

      • taskHelp

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder taskHelp(java.lang.String helpText)
        Sets the task help text of the script tasks.
        Task Help
        A script task can also have an optional help text. The help text shall describe in detail what the task does and when it could be executed. The method IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder.taskHelp(String) sets the help of the script task.

        The help shall be elaborate text about what the task does and how to use it. The String can be multiline.

        The help text is automatically expanded with the help for user defined script task arguments, see IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder.newUserDefinedArgument(String, Class, String).

        Specified by:
        taskHelp in interface IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder
        Parameters:
        helpText - the help text for the script task
        Returns:
        this builder
